main event: An 18-year-old youth reported seeing a large glowing red or amber object in the sky while driving near Crane, Indiana.
interesting points: The object was observed at a height of 75 to 100 feet and was estimated to be 40 feet in diameter.,The sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds.,Witness claimed to have seen the object leave the area at a speed comparable to that of a shooting star.,The sky was clear and no other aircraft were reported in the area at the time.,The witness's father had also reported a UFO sighting less than a month earlier.
sighted object: large glowing red or amber object
witness description: 18 year old youth living with parents in Crane, Indiana.
